result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steave A Daniels Jr

Defendant Steave A Daniels Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes appeared by video for Steave A Daniels Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Calendar Call. Defendant appears. Court vacates the stayed warrant. Court vacates the 10/26/2022 Jury Trial.
Case adjourned for final pretrial and for jury trial in Branch 30.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 30, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Steave A Daniels Jr not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Steave A Daniels Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for final pretrial.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Br. 30.
Calendar call scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review.
Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review.
Received and filed; forwarded to the Judge for review.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. Defense requests a final pretrial and jury trial date. Case adjourned, Branch 30.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Steave A Daniels not in court, in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant's appearance waived for today's hearing. Case in court for pre-trial conference. Defense requests more time to review case. Case remains calendared in Branch 30.  Status conference scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Ronald K.W

Defendant Steave A Daniels in court with attorney Amanda M. Parent.  Defendant Steave A Daniels in custody.  Kenneth Olstinski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Steave A Daniels appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
